name: Pengun
description:
Pengun is a 3rd person shooting, defense, survivor game.

The sick Santa Claus got Coronavirus, he's not able to send gifts in Christmas.
he decided to send gifts through hot air balloons, these balloons often crashes in the
harsh Antarctica route, those spread the mass of garbage onto icebergs.

Penguins decided to shoot down balloons and avenge the Santa.

Contents:
- Nice anti-air guns including cool German Flak 88mm
- Enjoyable bullet hell from those automatic AA guns
- Boxes that might arise your curiosity
- Random items from boxes
- Cool level up and combo system
- Customizing penguin

Current Development: Beta, some of options are under construction.
